# Mint (Building)
## Overview
**Mint**

**Create** 49 Goods, 2 Influence, 45 Labor (1,940 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Artisan's Workshop (Room)|Artisanâ€™s Workshop]], 1 Fortification ([[Vault (Room)|Vault]]), 1 [[Guard Post (Room)|Guard Post]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 2 [[Vault (Room)|Vaults]]

A secure building where coinage is minted and standard weights and measures are kept.
